status: Part ClosureFromNameField. This type is generally safe to ignore. From a user's perspective, they should only care about what they explicitly define and what they get back. Anything else is an implementation detail. This is particularly true of the `type` field which acts as a
reason: Saturday 25 and Sunday 26 October, no service between Embankment / Edgware Road and Ealing Broadway / Kensington (Olympia) / Richmond / Wimbledon. Use MILDMAY LINE services between Gunnersbury, Kew Gardens and Richmond when available. If travelling to/from Chelsea vs Sunderland at Stamford Bridge, please use PICCADILLY LINE services to/from Earls Court and continue at street level.
